description: Try our easy to follow Iced Coconut & Lime With Mint Vegan Ice-Cream recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Iced Coconut & Lime With Mint Vegan Ice-Cream
name: Iced Coconut & Lime With Mint Vegan IceCream Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Remove from the freezer 510 minutes before serving to soften. Use a hot spoon to scoop into bowls and serve topped with mint and coconut sugar.
